## On EEG Tower

*Step 1:* Hit Stop sign. \
*Step 2:* Click the Eyeball icon.\
*Step 3:* Hit the play button.\
*Step 4:* Add your participants ID and other information on the file name.\
*Step 5:* Save the file to start recording.\

::: {.callout-note title="Check"}
The recording is indicated by a red bar on the bottom of the screen (“SAVING HDD”).
:::

*Step 6:* Confirm that BrainVision is recording (green play button is active, time elapsed is at the bottom of the screen).
